website_summaries.verdict: A soft squeezable plastic set ideal for toddlers and preschoolers, although you may have to let it set a while to get rid of a strong odor.
pros: Set includes 6 pins, a ball, and a carrying case
cons: Reports that some of these come with a strong chemical smell that takes a while to wear off

customer_reviews.title: ... set has a very strong chemical smell that doesn't easily air out and thus I wouldn't recommend it for ...
customer_reviews.text: This bowling set has a very strong chemical smell that doesn't easily air out and thus I wouldn't recommend it for young kids who tend to put toys in the mouth. In general, I believe all kids toys manufacturers should follow certain safety guidelines, and producing a toy with such a strong toxic small isnt something you would expect from a known brand such as Melissa & Doug.
customer_reviews.author: Iredeto

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids and grandparents.
customer_reviews.text: My little granddaughter absolutely loved this bowling set. It was actually her favorite Christmas present from us. Her mom and dad were less enthusiastic, given the setting up and knocking down of the pins - but eventually warmed to the toy after they saw how much fun she was having. My granddaughter is 2 1/2 years old and she got the idea very quickly. The set comes with a zippered carrying case for easy clean up after play. The colors are vibrant and the little animals can also be used as bathtub as toys. The "pins" are sufficiently weighted to stand up by themselves and not just fall down by themselves. It comes with one "bowling ball".
customer_reviews.author: Shredder

customer_reviews.title: Cute but mine were defective
customer_reviews.text: Cute set but the ones I received most of the animals are smushed and aren't poping back into shape. Some don't stand up either they just fall right down because of the rounded bottom or the slant of them. Unfortunate :-(
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Stephens

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful toy.
customer_reviews.text: Our 2-year-old granddaughter loves this bowling set, which we keep at our house for when she visits. Recently, some friends came over with their 8-month-old daughter, who really enjoyed knocking down the pins, so we sent their own bowling set as a surprise gift and they loved it. The animal bowling pins are extremely cute. The colors are bright and beautiful. Everything is made of soft rubbery material that won't damage tile floors or even make any noise when the pins fall down. The carrying case makes it easy to put everything away neatly when it's not in use. This is a wonderful toy.
customer_reviews.author: Bestwishes

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: We got this almost 3 years back when the boys were 4.5 and 2 years old. It has held up very well over the years. Both of them still love it. Each piece seems very sturdy and is beautiful to look at. The pins are good for pretend playing as well. The best part is that it comes with storage.
customer_reviews.author: Indranil Biswas

customer_reviews.title: Such a good toy, I really should write a positive review for other parents... And now I have.
customer_reviews.text: A very simple toy that the kids can use in multiple ways. It teaches physical skills. It can be played alone or with friends. It helped them take turns and play together. We purchased this last year and it has proven to entertain my 2- (now 3-) year old and 5- (now 6-) year olds pretty often. It's NOT a "here's what you do with this toy and after you do it for three minutes you're done" kind of a toy, for which I'm grateful. Every time the kids get this toy out, I think, "I should really write a review on that. Other parents should know." So now I have.
customer_reviews.author: PnJ

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute and well made little set. It's a hard rubber material. They're strong enough to stand up on their own but also easy to knock over with the ball.
customer_reviews.author: Roger E.

customer_reviews.title: Not soft and squeezable as described.
customer_reviews.text: My two year old grand-daughter enjoyed these toys, bowling pins and ball. But these are not as described AT ALL. There is a description that says the pins are soft, I believe it even said plush. I liked the idea of soft so they would be more quiet on a hardwood floor. But the pins, while very cute and colorful, are very hard. Not plush. Not soft or pliable like I was expecting. Not a dealbreaker. But the description should be revised.
customer_reviews.author: L. L. Koza

customer_reviews.title: I GOT THESE FOR MY 2 YEAR OLD GRANDSON
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my grandson who's only two, and thought it would be a great way for him to learn his colors, numbers, different animals and coordination while having fun at the same time. The bright colors attracted his eyes right to it, then the ball I tell you he just created his own way of having fun right from the start! I like these toys and so did his parents. I do enjoy toys that can teach a child at the same time allowing them to have fun.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Fun, interesting and well made
customer_reviews.text: The shape of the pins are perfect for little hands. The pins are sturdy and heavy enough to sit upright on carpet and light enough to fall over when the little ball hits them. The ball is easy to hold and has enough weight to roll on carpet. The carry case makes it easy to contain the parts in one place. The bright colors and smiling animal faces inspire play. We all enjoy bowling with our 2 1/2 year old and he continues to enjoy this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Kitten

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute. I bought them for my almost-2-year-old, but my 5 year old is the one playing with them. The younger one doesn't really have the capability of rolling the ball to knock over the pins, and really isn't interested in playing with the pins. So, I would definitely recommend this for children 3 and up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible odor that transfers to child's hands!
customer_reviews.text: The strong fragrance coming off this product is unreal. Like cheap baby powder or perfume. Awful. And my toddler's hands now smell awful, too. Returning this today! I expect high quality from Melissa & Doug - and this bowling set is not. It appears to have been manufactured with some unidentified chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Multi-use toy! 2yr old loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My toddler received this as a bday gift. She is not yet into balls and sports but she loves it! She carries around the animals like dolls, and we have even used them as giant bath toys. They are made of soft plastic and hold their shape well. I'm sure when she is a little older and exposed to more bowling parties she will enjoy using the toy for its intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: ChicagoMom

customer_reviews.title: Very cute product. Very well made. Love all Melissa and Doug’s products
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute product. I like that the pins are different colors and different animals. I got this for my two year old granddaughter. I think it’s really better for a little older.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Kulp

customer_reviews.title: Bowling pins and ball are small enough for small hands to handle and are really well made
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product for our granddaughters 2 birthday, loves the animal bowling pins. Very colorful and well constructed, we were surprised at how solid they are and expect they will last over the next few years. Would recommend this product for those who are looking for a cute colorful gift for the little ones in their life
customer_reviews.author: ADK Native

customer_reviews.title: It was his favorite toy for about a month or two
customer_reviews.text: My son (2 years old) loves these. It was his favorite toy for about a month or two.He still plays with them, but its much more sporadic. He had more fun lining the "pins" up from place to place. He never really bowled much with it to be honest. He would just line them up, and then move them to another place and line them up. I will say the ball is pretty hard. I feel like the pins were a softer plastic. I would not want the ball being thrown all over the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute animals, but ball is hard
customer_reviews.text: My kids love the animals but they are all made of hard plastic. The ball is especially hard and heavy so it will knock down the pins, but it is also a bit too hard for my 2-year olds to play with. They have thrown it in the air and hit each other in the head with it several times. We had to take the ball away.
customer_reviews.author: SACPHX

customer_reviews.title: Great childhood toy!
customer_reviews.text: Best kids bowling ball set. Great for toddlers. Let's be serious, we aren't going to teach our toddlers how to make a strike or keep score. But the Melissa and Doug pins do stand up nicely and the ball works! Bowling sets are great for large motor skills, balance and teaching concepts like rolling, up, down, and in this set animals and colors. The Melissa and Doug set will teach colors, animals and help children with speech in their play. This is a long lasting toy- preschoolers and gradeschoolers will incorporate the set into other forms of play and find alternate uses for pins. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: nanalisa

customer_reviews.title: Fun stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is cute. My kid likes it. The ball is heavy enough to knock the pins over and they're the perfect size for my 2-year old to enjoy - not too big so I'll trip on them, and not so small that I'll not see them and... trip on them. I trip a lot.
customer_reviews.author: tinaamber

customer_reviews.title: Melissa and Doug Bowling Friends is excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Melissa and Doug Bowling Friends For my 18 month old grandson. The quality of the pins and the ball are excellent. It’s super sturdy. The pins are easy to stand on an even surface. The weight of the ball is perfect for rolling and for knocking the pins over. It’s Also the perfect weight for a toddler to hold. The pins are shaped like various animals and are brightly colored.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for young kids
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for young kids! I ordered this for my nephew who will be 2 in June, and I was astonished by the quality. They are much bigger than expected, made of nice easy to clean plastic and it comes with a great convenient carrying case. The ball is textured so it's easy for little fingers to grab. I love the animal designs, great for a child's imagination, and so beautifully colored. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Batty

customer_reviews.title: A Strike!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my one year old grandson for Christmas. He and his four year old brother love it and play bowling in the hallway of their house. The set is colorful and charming, and the kids can handle it easily. It was a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: victoria phillips

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little kids
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (1 1/2) loves this. She's definitely on the young end but we got it a few months ago and she can throw or kick the ball and gets excited when the pins fall down. Definitely something she will grow into and the case it comes in has been great to carry it in and store it. The string on the zipper did end up breaking but my daughter loves zippers so would zip and unzip it A LOT.
customer_reviews.author: Girl Mom 2

customer_reviews.title: Be warned if you have a thrower...
customer_reviews.text: This little bowling set is cute! It seems very well made and very durable. Just be warned if you have a toddler that likes to throw, these are not soft foam! Would still purchase again but I have to closely supervise my wild child with these!
customer_reviews.author: Kacie

customer_reviews.title: Great Bowling Set
customer_reviews.text: I love Melissa & Doug products for kids. Their quality is unmatched, and the design and durability are impressive. I got this for my nephew a while back, and he enjoys playing bowling with his grandparents (they like it, too)! I'll never question the affordability and longevity of M&D products because I know 99.9% of the time, they will be fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves this bowling set. Pins seem durable, and are weighted well: I have no problem standing these upright on my laminate floors -- my toddler can set them upright on her own without them falling over. Plastic pins are on the soft side -- not quite rubber-soft, but not like the cheaper, brittle plastic on the sets from your local wal-mart (which I have purchased several times before.) The ball is a very good size for little hands. Really pleased with this purchase -- would definitely gift it or recomend it to other parents.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Animals won't stay balanced and tip over too easily. Hard to put them back up and keep ...
customer_reviews.text: Animals won't stay balanced and tip over too easily. Hard to put them back up and keep them up long enough to roll the ball to knock them back down.
customer_reviews.author: Nell Aiken

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, color and fun-worth the extra cost!
customer_reviews.text: This is a toy that will last! The quality of the "pins" and ball surpasses less expensive models. It is colorful and can provide even younger toddlers fun ways to play even before coordinating to "bowling" is developed! My 15 month old grandson is having a blast with them though Mommy and Daddy need to help him along sometimes. He claps and yells horray when the cute animals fall!
customer_reviews.author: ethere

customer_reviews.title: Adorable first bowling set
customer_reviews.text: My toddler absolutely loves these. She's not yet 2 so she's still trying to learn the whole bowling thing. However, she'll play for hours with each of the bowling pins. They're super cute, and a great size for toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: n

customer_reviews.title: Set works great, but still has a bit of a smell
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves the bowling set. The pegs have a bit of a plasticky smell to them still and it's been a few weeks. But, otherwise, the pins sit flat and the ball is heavy enough to knock the pins down.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Cute, sturdy and lovable!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter a few months before she turned 3. At first didn't want to hit them with the ball because "that's not nice", but now enjoys using them mostly how they're intended. They're sturdy and super cute, easy for her to grip and set up, and have survived a kiddo bowling with them, packing them up in a backpack to take to school, and yes even sleeping with them in her bed at night. She sets them up on those yoga mat squares and they stand without issue.
customer_reviews.author: K. Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little players
customer_reviews.text: So cute and perfect for little ones. My 2 year old loves for multiple reasons. She actually plays the game but she also just plays with the pins and animals. Easy to set up and use she can do it herself which is a huuuge plus. No more mommy do it mommy do it
customer_reviews.author: Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Fun and great quality bowling for littles
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun game for all ages - from toddler and up. The quality of these bowling pins are great. They are vibrant, soft and love that it comes with its own bag to put the pins and ball back into for next time.
customer_reviews.author: Carla K.

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I think this was a good gift for my 19 month old, even though she is more into the ball than the pins. I think she will use both the pins and ball once she’s a bit older. The color and quality are great.
customer_reviews.author: Night Rain

customer_reviews.title: Cute Set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 2 year old niece. I had a set for my children that was hard plastic with a plastic bowling ball - it was always getting thrown around the house and they would bonk each other off the head with the pins. These pins are softer and so cute. Each pin is a different animal. If the child doesn't want to bowl, they can use the pins for creative play. I like that the set is only 6 pins too - any more would get lost around the house.
customer_reviews.author: DakOdinTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: The characters of this bowling set are colorful and interesting. I bought this set for my granddaughter. She's 2 and a half, and she loves playing with the animals. She had a lot of fun setting them up and trying to knock them down with the ball. Perfect gift for a toddler.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Faz

customer_reviews.title: Super cute toy
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute toy, my daughter loves it. Removing 1 star though because the ball and pins smell weird, like a lotion but somewhat like it’s a chemical smell from the plastic. Also, the ball and pins scuff really easily due to the material they’re made of.
customer_reviews.author: Soraya Katmeh

customer_reviews.title: Durable and fun bowling set for young toddler
customer_reviews.text: 2yo was very excited to open this as a present. Pins are easy to stand up and ball is a good size. Durable plastic. I was worried about him chewing on other foam pins but this plastic is strong and can withstand his rough play.
customer_reviews.author: SarahJoyce

customer_reviews.title: Great toy.
customer_reviews.text: Great toy. My daughter got this when she was one and since now she loves to plays and she’s 5 now. Even her cousin who is 9 still comes over and asking to play bowling. Also, they smell nice.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Weird smell...fun toy
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these and they’re fun to play with. They have an odd smell though which doesn’t go away. My dog must like the smell because he ate the head off the giraffe. :( Not sure how to get a replacement
customer_reviews.author: lastingmemories.byellen

customer_reviews.title: Cute starter set
customer_reviews.text: We love how cute the animals are! They’re weighted nice too so they stay upright. The holes in the ball are weird though so u have to hold the back like a normal ball and throw it but the kids love this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Briana M

customer_reviews.title: He seemed to have loved it. I can hear him playing it sometimes
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for my niece and one for my upstairs neighbor's son who was turning two. He seemed to have loved it. I can hear him playing it sometimes, I only have myself to blame haha. My niece played with it a bit but not quite as much she was about 18 months when I gave it to her. It comes in a durable plastic zippered bag that everything can be neatly packed away in. Nothing feels cheep about it and the pins are really cute. My niece just was maybe a bit too young for it, she played with the pins and ball separately rather than together.
customer_reviews.author: DTirelli

customer_reviews.title: Sturdier and better quality than you might expect for the price
customer_reviews.text: Our toddler LOVES this. Sturdier and better quality than you might expect for the price. They have a nice feel to them, sized just right for little hands and are stable enough that he can set them up himself. Great purchase, we are very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: R Silvert

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of Melissa and Doug. These are so colorful and cute. This was part of my 2 1/2 year old nephews Christmas present and he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Calissi

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Versatile Toy!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves them! He is only a year old but can easily set them up (maybe not as straight as I would). He uses both hands and his feet sometimes to roll the ball. I like how the pins are all different characters. We play with them like they are friends and have named each one. The only thing I wish they had going for them is if they squeaked better. I know they probably aren't designed to squeak but that would make them more fun I think.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Llama

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a cute baby shower gift for my niece. The little animal pins are adorable very sturdy, kids love playing with it or chewing on it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for my 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: We've been using them on carpet and they stand up great just like everyone said! My son really loves these they're cute little animals and they are not hard and heavy enough to use as Weapons LOL very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: I got this as part of a gift for a 2 year old and the kiddo loved it. These seem well made and the price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Ofira

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought This for my 12mo old granddaughter and she loves. Well made very durable. No smell would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Kat F.

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it!!
customer_reviews.text: My nieces love it! The bowling pins are squeezable and fun to look at. On the bottom of the bag there are game suggestions (based on age) to help build skill levels and I really appreciate that. This was a purchase for my 2 y/o niece to help with her motor skills
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and well-designed
customer_reviews.text: This Melissa and Doug Bowling kit is a great alternative to many other indoor toys offered for toddlers. While our 19 month old granddaughter is still learning to play (rolling the ball and setting up the pins), it's nice to have a toy that promotes large motor skill development and is appealing and entertaining for little children.
customer_reviews.author: JKos

customer_reviews.title: Can be used to learn counting too!
customer_reviews.text: We just received this from Amazon yesterday and our girl instantly LOVED it. She's almost two years old and just started counting on her own. We didn't expect her to use this to practice counting, but that's what she started doing. She hasn't caught on to the bowling part yet. :-) The animals are soft and adorable. She (and I) love looking at them. Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and engaging.
customer_reviews.text: 2-Year Old's Birthday gift actually cuter than picture, colorful with imaginative animal faces. Appears to be very well made. Little guy learned how to bowl in less than 10 minutes, in addition to taking T-Ball bat, Golf Clubs, and Basketballs to knock over/send flying pins.
customer_reviews.author: LSW

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun!
customer_reviews.text: We love bowling! This was a great buy. The only downfall is the holes in the bowling ball are too spaced out for my daughter to grip it properly.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Liz

customer_reviews.title: Absolute joy and fun!
customer_reviews.text: What 2 year old boy doesn't love to roll/throw a ball?! My grandson enjoyed this adorable bowling set more than I dreamed!
customer_reviews.author: J Shackelford

customer_reviews.title: Darling
customer_reviews.text: My two year old adores this. Very sturdy and good colors. She packs them around with her.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Martin

customer_reviews.title: Soft but not as soft as I expected.
customer_reviews.text: They are very sturdy and durable, but I expected them to be a bit softer type of plastic. My son still loves em!
customer_reviews.author: Sean D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy. My daughter who is almost 2 does ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice toy. My daughter who is almost 2 does not know how to playing with it. But she likes picking up and bite the cute animals and rolling the ball. The big concern is that these plastic ones do have some strange smell. I guess they are not designed for children to bite. So the material used might not be heathy for little ones, at least the smell from it.
customer_reviews.author: Celine W.

customer_reviews.title: Great bowling set
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old granddaughter absoutly loves these! Not just to bowl with either she just carries them around!! They set up nicely and seem pretty durable. Lots of fun for our little one!
customer_reviews.author: Teri Norman

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy and hours of play
customer_reviews.text: My toddlers love this toy. Only complaint is the ball isn't perfectly round so it rolls wonky at times
customer_reviews.author: L. Brenner

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 1 year old birthday party (realized it was for 2 year and up after buying). I got a cute picture the next day of the little boy playing with it and she said he loved it !
customer_reviews.author: Erica Pence

customer_reviews.title: She can spend what seems like hours taking them out of the package
customer_reviews.text: My 18-month old granddaughter adores her bowling friends. She can spend what seems like hours taking them out of the package, lining them up, moving them to the other side of the room, and putting them away again. If her older sister has her way, there will be bowling friends mayhem, but until then, the baby is happy as a grig to play with them her way.
customer_reviews.author: SusieM

customer_reviews.title: Great Toddler Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for a three year old and they loved it!
customer_reviews.author: nick h

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for toddler
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 26 month old to play outside with. It’s well made and durable. My kid loves playing with it as animal figurines more than for bowling which is fine.
customer_reviews.author: blankpad

customer_reviews.title: Nice set.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute product! My 4 year old opened the package and put it on her bookshelf by herself, but later when I grabbed the bag and cardboard from inside, they smelled terrible. Not sure why, but I wasn't too pleased with that part. After airing out a bit, I re-purposed the bag to hold Mr. Potato Head pieces. It was too nice to not have a purpose. lol.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: got this for a one year olds birthday and he loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is fun to play with and while he is throwing the ...
customer_reviews.text: My son, who is 18 months, loves this and so do I. It is fun to play with and while he is throwing the ball and using his hands to knock down the pins, it seems like the kind of game that has staying power once he is able to better grasp the concept. It is also fun/educational to talk about the animals, sounds and colors.
customer_reviews.author: Mothermars

customer_reviews.title: He loved the characters
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 2 yr old grandson, for us to play bowling. He loved the characters, but was happier with the ball. He talked to the characters & put them back into the bag for sleeping, but played with the ball. He will learn in time. Well made, very cute & functional! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Ruth A. Manno

customer_reviews.title: Well-made and so cute
customer_reviews.text: Thank you Melissa and Doug for continuing to make quality products for little ones. My almost 2 gdaughter loves this game.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler toy.
customer_reviews.text: Love this toy. Challenging and encouraging toy for our little toddlers. Great toy will recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the different variety of animals.
customer_reviews.text: These turned out to be much better than I expect, Very good quality. My Little one is 10 months old and loves to carry them around throw them about and knock them down with her hand and they haven’t change shape or dent at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jo A

customer_reviews.title: Melissa and Doug Animal Bowling Set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this animal bowling set by Melissa and Doug for my almost three year old daughter for christmas. So far she hasn't played with it a lot, but it's a really cute bowling set. Good quality so I'm giving it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy555

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! Small, durable, good weight, easy to clean. They are adorable too!
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Cute, sturdy, easy to clean, and my kid loves it. He likes to bite them. Ball is easy to grip and made of sturdy material.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Am wondering
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't anybody else think that bowling down animal headed pins again and again could develope the message, habit or pattern in a young growing child's brain that it's ok to harm animals in a bad way? Just wondering, because that is how I felt when the order arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: 2 yr old loves them
customer_reviews.text: Adorable. My 2 yr old granddaughter loves them!! Not frustrating like some that fall over
customer_reviews.author: LORI

customer_reviews.title: My son has so much fun playing with this set
customer_reviews.text: My son has so much fun playing with this set. He loves throwing balls all over the place whether it's at our heads or toward something that won't say "ouch!" This set is so cute and I love the carrying case for easy storage
customer_reviews.author: ll04

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and attractive but will not hold a child's attention long.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality but won't hold a young Child' s attention span for long.
customer_reviews.author: sweetsue

customer_reviews.title: Maybe the best kids bowling set around
customer_reviews.text: These are really high quality. The pins are made out of a rubbery type of material, not the hard, thin plastic a lot of toys are. As others have stated, the pins stay up pretty well on low pile carpet. Theyre cute and the kids have fun with them. Very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Smith

customer_reviews.title: Kids love
customer_reviews.text: My toddlers absolutely love playing with these. Don’t know what the blue guy is suppose to be but that’s about the only problem I had.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves this toy. The quailty is really good. The animals are fun and variant. The material is perfect for indoor and outdoor play. Easy to clean and store in the bag it comes in.
customer_reviews.author: Estefania De Jesus

customer_reviews.title: Very cute bowling set. The material is more of ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute bowling set. The material is more of a rubbery type plastic so it's not loud or harsh against our wood floors. My daughter received this as a gift from us at 18 months old & doesn't get the bowling concept but she enjoys carrying around the pins and making animal sounds. It's definitely a toy that she'll grow into and is high quality!
customer_reviews.author: CarlyAnne

customer_reviews.title: bowlling
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son's first birthday - his sister gave it to him as a present and a couple days later we used it for a game at his carnival themed party- it's really cute but quite hard for the smaller kids to get the ball to roll right. they still had fun playing with it though.
customer_reviews.author: asmith1021

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My two year grandson loves it! He gets color recognition, counting , animal recognition, and physical exercise with one toy !
customer_reviews.author: momaseata

customer_reviews.title: The animals make it special and fun to
customer_reviews.text: It is very appealing toy. My son plays every day. The animals make it special and fun to play
customer_reviews.author: Roxana

customer_reviews.title: Nice starter bowling set
customer_reviews.text: My son lost interest in this quickly but it was well made and fun while he was interested in it. If you think your child would like it, it is worth it. We thought he would like it since he loves kicking balls. But bowling by kicking didn't hold his interest.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: 21 mos old grandson loves this! They are very sturdy thick rubber like. He plays with his indoors. Ball has little partial holes for fingers which you can't really put your fingers into. Fun and entertaining for him
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy.
customer_reviews.text: Fun toy...2 year old daughter loves setting up the pins and knocking them down! Only thing worth mentioning is they are made of hard plastic, which has been dropped on a little toe a few times and caused a tear or two.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Hart

customer_reviews.title: One of the best Christmas gifts that my 2 yo got this year
customer_reviews.text: One of the best Christmas gifts that my 2 yo got this year. Even her older brothers like to play with her. The "pins" are cute and they are weighted enough that they are not constantly falling over and are easy to set up. I definitely recommend this set!
customer_reviews.author: Gibby

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for three-four year olds
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for a three year old. My nephew loves to play with the individual animals and like rolling the ball. So many ways to play. Not too heavy but still heavy enough to stand up outside on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Kellyn

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: So cute, my Grandson loves this. He carries the little animals around too. Gives them a ride on his bike.. so cute.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my 2yr old grand son loves it. He makes up his own rules !
customer_reviews.author: Charsido

customer_reviews.title: Such a cute gift for little kids!!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute gift for little kids. My daughter is going to love this and the little animals as the pins. So cute!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley S.

customer_reviews.title: Always well-made and fun. Their customer service department is outstanding and ready ...
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with Melissa & Doug. Always well-made and fun. Their customer service department is outstanding and ready to answer questions or replace missing pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie J

customer_reviews.title: Ball was missing from bowling package. Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice but it was missing the ball! No fun in bowling without a ball.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! This gift made a 1 yr old boy very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my two year old grandson and he just loves it. He loves to carry the animals around and likes to line them up in a row. Not intrestedf in the bgowling concept but he loves the animals and the ball. I would recommend this maybe for a three year and older child.
customer_reviews.author: Squiggy

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, arrived in great condition
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my niece. It arrived in great condition and looks adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey C

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for toddlers and bigger kids
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my 2-year-old niece, but her 6-year-old brother loves it just as much. Great toy with adorable pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my almost 2 year old nephew. He loves animals, so even the pins bybthemselves were fun. The whole set is good quality plastic, so I fully expect it to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

product_meta.title: Melissa & Doug Bowling Friends
product_meta.description:
100% HAPPINESS GUARANTEE: We design every toy to the highest quality standards, and to nurture minds and hearts. If your child is not inspired, give us a call and we’ll make it right. Our phone number is on every product!

BRAND STORY
By

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
From classic wooden toys to crafts, pretend play, and games, Melissa & Doug products provide a launch pad to ignite imagination and a sense of wonder in all children so they can discover themselves, their passions, and their purpose. 

Since the company’s founding more than 25 years ago, Melissa & Doug has consistently delivered innovative products that inspire open-ended thinking, encourage kids to see new possibilities, and offer Countless Ways to Play. It’s part of a bigger vision to Take Back Childhood. Because by giving children a true childhood with the space and freedom to explore their world, we give them a path to realizing their full potential!

See more
feature_bullets: PLUSH BOWLING SET: The Melissa & Doug Bowling Friends Preschool Playset features 6 animal bowling pins and a 4-inch indented bowling ball, along with a zippered carry case for easy storage and portability.
WEIGHTED BOTTOMS: This soft bowling set for kids is easy for children to set up and play with, thanks to the weighted bottoms in each bowling pin.

EASY TO STORE: Our bowling game set for kids can be easily stored in the included zippered carrying case. This fun bowling game also helps kids develop gross motor skills, balance, and hand-eye coordination.

GIFT FOR AGES 2 TO 4: This play set makes an exceptional gift for kids from 2 to 4 years. Add the Melissa & Doug Catch & Count Fishing Game to round out the hands-on play experience and give kids another engaging option for screen-free fun.

“THE GOLD STANDARD IN CHILDHOOD PLAY”: For more than 30 years, Melissa & Doug has created beautifully designed imagination- and creativity-sparking products that NBC News called “the gold standard in early childhood play.”

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
